instructions_precautions: Take with full glass of water. Remain upright for 20 minutes afterward.

sig: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed for pain. Maximum dose is 12 tablets per 24 hours.
instructions_precautions: May cause drowsiness. Do not drive any vehicle and avoid alcohol. Avoid additional acetaminophen (APAP). Take with food.
